name: Pushover (itch)
description:
Made by Deckard

This game is something i made to start learning how to make games, and is by no means good. 

Feel free to play this while queuing for your next game, or whenever you just want to waste some time.

I may make updates to the game to make it have more depth but for now, this is it, have fun.

you get imaginary cookies if you can get more than 15 points : D
